# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SSE2 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SSE2 Instructions. A value of true indicates the processor supports the SSE2 extensions.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SSE2
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
